Turning Weight Loss into a Game

  • June 24, 2012
  • health

After gaining 90 lbs. in my college years, I tried a number of approaches to losing weight. The method that eventually worked was to feed into my fondness for min-maxing stats in video games and make that part of my weight loss plan.
